name: playwright-cucumber-framework
description: Playwright automation framework with Cucumber BDD

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); ['reports', 'test-results'].forEach(dir => {try {fs.rmSync(path.join(__dirname, dir), {recursive: true, force: true}); fs.mkdirSync(path.join(__dirname, dir), {recursive: true});} catch (e) {console.error(e)}});"
scripts.test: cucumber-js --config cucumber.js --format html:reports/cucumber-report.html --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format summary && node generateReport.js
scripts.test:tag: cucumber-js --config cucumber.js --format html:reports/cucumber-report.html --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format summary --tags "@valid_login" && node generateReport.js
